snippet: Putting was the key as Jack Nicklaus beat Arnold Palmer in an 18-hole playoff to win the 1962 United States Open at Oakmont.
abstract: Dave Anderson Sports of The Times column revisits the 1962 United States Open golf tournament at Oakmont, where putting was the key as Jack Nicklaus beat Arnold Palmer in an 18-hole playoff.
lead_paragraph: Putting was the key as Jack Nicklaus beat Arnold Palmer in an 18-hole playoff to win the 1962 United States Open at Oakmont.

headline.seo: 50 Years Ago, Arnold Palmer Let the U.S. Open Slip Away
headline.main: For Palmer, One That Got Away
headline.print_headline: For Palmer, One That Got Away
